dependency_analyzer_bugs: Does not parse pyproject.toml files, only requirements.txt
No unit tests for DependencyAnalyzer class
code_smell_detection_bugs: Analyzes ALL files including non-code files (.md, .ini, .toml, etc.)
Uses rglob('*') without file type filtering
Results in thousands of false positives for non-code files
No file size limits or binary file detection
search_context_bugs: search_context doesn't find notes/memories even though they are stored
Missing routing logic for search_type='memories' in ContextManager
Memory search component exists but isn't called by search_context
known_issues.workspace_detection_issue: MCP_WORKSPACE_ROOT in .env.mcp is ignored because workspace is detected BEFORE .env.mcp is loaded
known_issues.workspace_solution: Set MCP_WORKSPACE_ROOT in system environment or MCP client config, not .env.mcp
known_issues.issue_details: Found duplicate start_edit_session_handler definitions in tools.py (lines 204 and 314). The handler in editing.py is calling with wrong parameter names (files, session_id instead of session_name, files).

fixes_applied: Fixed parameter order in start_edit_session_handler call
Added helper methods for TODO context extraction
Enhanced TODO parsing with pattern matching for common TODO types
Added code generation based on TODO content
